name: Praxis Engineering Technologies
overview:
Praxis Engineering Technologies, Inc., a technology consulting and solutions company, focuses on the application of software and system engineering technologies to solve the complex problems of defense departments, government and civilian agencies, and commercial corporations in the United States. It develops and markets FASTRAK, a field agents surveillance, tracking, reconstruction, and analysis kit that provides WiFi collection and reconstruction capabilities to defense department, intelligence, and law enforcement officers; PinPoint, a WiFi direction finding (DF) system that provides DF and geo-location capabilities; and FASTRAK Engine, a software development library that provides the ability to embed wireless packet collection, survey, and reconstruction capabilities directly into user applications. The company also provides program management services; software development services; IT support services, including server, network, software, database, and hardware administration, support, and monitoring services; IT infrastructure design, implementation, troubleshooting, performance tuning, virtualization, and general support services; and training services, as well as resells third-party software products.

Praxis Engineering Technologies, Inc. was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Annapolis Junction, Maryland with additional offices Vienna, Virginia; and Dallas, Texas.
